Articles.Content: Banned for tl;dr.

Banned because I just found out that the Kraken is a 5 Dimensional object, and so my 4 Dimensional Doomsday ChainsawTM was thrown into 5D space and it disintegrated

Don't even ask me how I managed to move an infinitely heavy object that is not affected by 3D gravity, I don't even know how I did it.

I shall now get to work on layering an infinite number of 4D Doomsday ChainsawsTM across the V axis to make a 5 Dimensional Doomserday ChainsawTM!

CREATING MINI CONTROLLED BIG BANG FOR INFINITE UNIVERSE WITH INFINITE SUPER'S......

DONE.

Banned because I have finished making my 5 Dimensional Doomserday ChainsawTM

PS, you could just create a 4D big bang and save yourself a lot of trouble

PPS, time is not the forth dimension, there are 10+ dimensions of space and 1 of time and the time dimension is totally different then a space dimension.

Edited February 7, 2014 by mikeman7918

Banned because: Wrong. F-.

0 dimensions: Static Point.

1 dimension: Infinite line.

2 dimensions: Infinite Square.

3 dimensions: Infinite 3D shape. Can contain other shapes.

4 dimensions: Our world. This one is animated because time.

5 dimensions: World with all alternate time lines present at once.

6 dimensions: World with ALL timelines, even impossible timelines, all present at once.

7 dimensions: Infinite Multiverse with all possible physics laws outcomes existing at the same time.

8 dimensions: Infinite Multiverse with all possible, even impossible physics (There IS such a thing) and outcomes at the same time.

9 dimensions: Everything above.

10 dimensions: A weird infinite multiverse without any physics at all, and anything and everything happens, at the same time. Pretty scary.

11 dimensions: Everything above, infinity'd.

There.

Edited February 7, 2014 by Souper

Banned because i don't understand a thing you're saying.

Banned for not recognizing a post from the Science Labs forum

Banned because what part of 10+ space Dimentions and 1 time Dimention don't you understand?

We can observe only 3 Dimentions of space and the one of time for a grand total of 4, but there still is a 4th Dimention of space that we cannot observe.

It's basic string theory, gosh...
